creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: discontinuous supplementary weft patterning; red ground with multicolored stripes (green, orange, white) with band of geometric patterning at each end; ends of cloth folded to a point with five pom poms attached to points
dimension: 126 1/2 x 17 1/2 in. (321.31 x 44.4 cm) (including pom poms)
title: Hairband (Cinta)
